data.title: Art + Main A Split Paranoia
data.description: Use your blind towards Art, like so, to enable your teammates towards Art to split.

data.title: Two Standard A Site Dark Cover Execute
data.description: Here are two different variations of Dark Cover smokes towards the A Site, choose one angle to isolate as you scale up.

data.title: Default Art One Way Dark Cover
data.description: Use this one way smoke towards Art to successfully pressure Defenders from peeking, as well as setting up a potential round-winning lurk towards Link.

data.title: B Site Dark Cover Default Smokes
data.description: A good set of default smokes to block common defender entry points onto B Site, as well as a strong flash to prevent easier picks.

data.title: B Site Post Plant Dark Cover
data.description: A  good Dark Cover for post plant that allows you to see enemies defusing while shrouding their vision.
